titleInfo.title: Religion and Her Older Sister: Interpretation of Magic in Tillich's Work with Respect to Recent Discourses in Psychology
Religion und Magie bei Paul Tillich

bibliographicCitation.lncs: Streib, H.: Religion and Her Older Sister: Interpretation of Magic in Tillich's Work with Respect to Recent Discourses in Psychology. In: Grau, K., Haigis, P., and Nord, I. (eds.) Religion und Magie bei Paul Tillich. Tillich-Preview. 2010, p. 5-24. Lit Verlag, Münster (2010).
bibliographicCitation.chicago: Streib, Heinz. 2010. “Religion and Her Older Sister: Interpretation of Magic in Tillich's Work with Respect to Recent Discourses in Psychology”. In Religion und Magie bei Paul Tillich, ed. Karin Grau, Peter Haigis, and Ilona Nord, 2010:5-24. Tillich-Preview. Münster: Lit Verlag.
